name: govwiki-site
description: California local government civic profile system for CPC
author: vadim ivlev

scripts.push: git add -A . && git commit -am 'v' && git push
scripts.jade_main: jade jade -P -o route && npm run replace
scripts.prod_main: npm run coffee_main && npm run uglify_main
scripts.watch: npm run jadew & npm run coffeew & npm run stylusw &
scripts.dev: npm run live-reload & npm run start & npm run watch & echo 'Launch browser and start editing files'
scripts.combine_min_vendors: cat js_files/jquery.min.js js/vendor/bootstrap.min.js js/vendor/moment.min.js bower_components/flot/jquery.flot.js bower_components/flot/jquery.flot.js bower_components/flot/jquery.flot.pie.js bower_components/numeral/numeral.js bower_components/typeahead-0.10.5.js/dist/typeahead.bundle.min.js bower_components/handlebars/handlebars.min.js bower_components/gmaps/gmaps.js js/vendor/history.js js/vendor/cookies.js js/vendor/bootstrap-table/bootstrap-table.min.js js/vendor/bootstrap-table/extensions/multiple-sort/bootstrap-table-multiple-sort.min.js > static/vendors.min.js
scripts.combine: npm run combine_min_vendors && npm run combine_vendors && npm run minify_vendors
